Title: Mystère la Revue
Desc: Mystère is a print magazine created by F.A. Dutour. It features political and artistic content that helps us reflect on contemporary society.

Title: 5k Radio
Desc: 5k Radio is an independent online radio that broadcasts a large array of music. As a decentralised community it uses this web app as a hub for future expansion.

Title: Pixl UI
Desc: Pixl is a conceptual user-experience focused cartoon streaming website with a simple and elegant UI.

Title: Spooky Tarot
Desc: This project was conceived as a fun promotional app used to raise brand awareness during the halloween period.
